org.wildfly.security.x500

Class X509CertificateCredentialDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.security.x500.X509CertificateCredentialDecoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CredentialDecoder

    public final class X509CertificateCredentialDecoder
extends Object
implements CredentialDecoder
    A credential decoder which can decode an X509Certificate into an X500Principal.
    Author:
    David M. Lloyd

    • Method Detail

      • getPrincipalFromCredential

        public X500Principal getPrincipalFromCredential(Object credential)
        Description copied from interface: CredentialDecoder
        Get the principal from an opaque credential. If this decoder cannot understand the given credential type, null is returned.
        Specified by:
        getPrincipalFromCredential in interface CredentialDecoder
        Parameters:
        credential - the credential to decode
        Returns:
        the principal, or null if this decoder does not understand the credential

      • getInstance

        public static X509CertificateCredentialDecoder getInstance()
        Get the singleton instance of this class.
        Returns:
        the credential decoder instance
